mapper.insert: insert into reservation (uidx, date, time, scooter) values (#{uIdx}, #{date}, #{time}, #{scooter})
mapper.update: update reservation set date = #{date}, time = #{time}, scooter = #{scooter} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from reservation where scooter = #{param1} and time = 2 and date between #{param2} and #{param3} order by date ASC;
select * from reservation where scooter = #{param1} and time =3 and date between #{param2} and #{param3} order by date ASC;
select * from reservation where uidx = #{uIdx} order by date ASC;
select * from reservation where uidx = #{uIdx} and date between #{param1} and #{param2} order by date ASC;
